text:
Created attachment 22753
Fix leak

The PKCS7 structure read in ssl_read_pkcs7 is not freed up. In the attached patch the internal certificate stack is set to NULL first to avoid it being freed up at the same time.
creator: steve@openssl.org
jorton@redhat.com
text: The PKCS#7 stuff isn't on 2.2.x; closed out since fixed on trunk.
